statements: SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, project_id, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 AND deadline < '2022-08-15';
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, deadline, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones WHERE progress_percentage IS NULL ORDER BY project_id DESC, milestone_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM remote_work_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM remote_work_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_description, due_date FROM project_milestones WHERE due_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.project_name, m.milestone_description FROM remote_work_projects p INNER JOIN project_milestones m ON p.project_id = m.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_description FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS milestone_count FROM remote_work_projects LEFT JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING milestone_count > 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, completed FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM remote_work_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date, completed FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' AND completed = TRUE;

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date, completed FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id WHERE project_name NOT LIKE '%XYZ%' ORDER BY project_name ASC, milestone_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date, completed, description FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id LEFT JOIN deadlines ON remote_work_projects.project_id = deadlines.project_id WHERE milestone_date > '2022-06-30' AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_milestones > 5 ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, status FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, team_role FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT deadline_date, deadline_description FROM deadlines WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY deadline_date;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM remote_work_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM remote_work_projects JOIN project_milestones ON remote_work_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id;
SELECT project_name, member_name, team_role FROM remote_work_projects JOIN team_members ON remote_work_projects.project_id = team_members.project_id;
SELECT project_name, deadline_date, deadline_description FROM remote_work_projects JOIN deadlines ON remote_work_projects.project_id = deadlines.project_id WHERE deadline_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-07-01';

SELECT team_members.member_name, team_members.member_role, tasks.task_name FROM team_members INNER JOIN tasks_assignee ON team_members.member_id = tasks_assignee.member_id INNER JOIN tasks ON tasks_assignee.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM tasks;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, task_name, task_description, task_status FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members;

SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status, member_name, member_role FROM tasks JOIN tasks_assignee ON tasks.task_id = tasks_assignee.task_id JOIN team_members ON tasks_assignee.member_id = team_members.member_id;
